channel.title: Auxy Sounds into Ableton
channel.description: Hello! I used Auxy way back when they had a completely different app and have always loved their sounds and presets. I switched from Auxy probably about half a year ago into Ableton, but constantly find myself wanting to use Auxy sounds. Is there any way to convert Auxy presets into an Ableton MIDI?

item.title: Auxy Sounds into Ableton
item.dc:creator: DreadedClout
item.description:
I think theres an option to convert auxy projects for ableton live you just gotta export the whole project

Read full topic
